purpose: Upgrade the trading pipeline into a deterministic-first, multi-tier ghost-to-live system with bus-scheduled routing, wallet-aware capital allocation, and full-stack P&L tracking that adapts as balances grow.
current_state_summary: Single-tier trading with limited enforcement of promotion/demotion and ghost-first gating.
Ghost trades are not required before live; capital ramps and rollbacks are manual.
Wallet balances are fragmented; sizing is not dynamically tied to live free balance changes.
Swap routing lacks bus-style scheduling across on/off-ramps with time/fee modeling.
Deterministic logic and audit trails are partial; AI components are not tightly bounded.
P&L, fee, and slippage tracking are incomplete across venues and wallets.
objectives: Implement a multi-tier strategy stack with deterministic promotion/demotion gates and clear capital ladders.
Mandate ghost trading proof with P&L, slippage, and latency thresholds before live; automate promotion and rollback.
Deliver wallet-aware capital allocation that adapts to balance increases, fee tiers, and venue constraints.
Introduce bus-scheduled swap/execution planning for on/off-ramp legs with SLA- and fee-aware routing.
Prefer deterministic logic; use AI only where it materially improves edge and is bounded by policy.
Establish end-to-end P&L tracking (realized/unrealized, fees, gas, borrow) with audit-ready artifacts.

in_scope: Tiered strategies with gates, capital ladders, and deterministic control logic.
Ghost/backtest/paper harness with automated promotion to limited live after passing targets.
Wallet consolidation and allocation that respond to detected balance changes and dust thresholds.
Bus-scheduled swap planner for routing across venues and on/off-ramps with time/fee modeling.
Full P&L ledgering with venue, wallet, and strategy attribution; slippage/fee decomposition.
Observation, logging, and capture flows for oversight, including scripts/branddozer_ui_capture.py.
out_of_scope: Unbounded leverage, perpetuals, or options outside defined risk budgets.
GPU-dependent research; solutions must run on CPU-only targets.
Building a consumer-facing UI beyond internal oversight and ops needs.

strategy_tiers.goal: Fast, low-size entries to validate edges and feed promotion signals.
strategy_tiers.logic: Deterministic rule-based filters with shallow models only where bounded; strict slippage/latency budgets.
strategy_tiers.risk_limits: Tight per-trade stops, micro position sizing, and session loss caps.
strategy_tiers.exit: Time-based expiry with spread/fee-aware take-profit and micro trailing stops.

strategy_tiers.goal: Higher-accuracy confirmation with moderate size after T0 success.
strategy_tiers.logic: Cross-validated factors and ensembles that remain CPU-friendly; deterministic gating around AI usage.
strategy_tiers.risk_limits: Volatility-aware sizing, per-venue caps, and hedged or market-neutral default posture.
strategy_tiers.exit: Signal decay, correlation/volatility deterioration, and adverse move thresholds.

strategy_tiers.goal: Longer horizon or higher conviction allocations with controlled turnover.
strategy_tiers.logic: Regime-aware blends and carry/momentum with deterministic overrides for risk events.
strategy_tiers.risk_limits: Portfolio-level drawdown/VAR caps, laddered entries/exits, and rebalancing bands.
strategy_tiers.exit: Regime flip, target band completion, or scheduled rebalance with slippage caps.

operating_principles: Ghost-first enforcement: live path locked until ghost and paper metrics exceed gates.
Deterministic logic by default; AI components must be bounded, explainable, and bypassable.
Capital ramps begin at minimum viable sizing; only increase after consecutive green windows per tier.
Wallet-aware sizing recalculates after each balance change, fee tier shift, or settlement event.
Never-lose-money posture: fail safe to hedged or flat when data, venue, or model quality degrades.
Observability by default: structured logs, blotter, P&L ledger, and screen captures for oversight.

capital_protection: Per-tier stops, drawdown caps, and per-venue/asset ceilings enforced in config.
Kill-switch and auto-flatten on data gaps, venue errors, KPI breaches, or config drift.
Circuit-breakers on abnormal slippage, latency, or liquidity; rollback to ghost mode on breach.
operational_controls: Ghost/live toggles, promotion approvals, and automatic demotion on KPI regression.
Heartbeat checks for data feeds, wallets, venues, and routing; default to safest rail on misses.
Immutable config history with diff alerts; deterministic fallbacks when AI components fail.
oversight: Structured logs, trade blotter, and decision traces stored immutably with timestamps.
Alerting for policy violations, missed hedges, delayed settlements, or swap/routing failures.
UX/log/screen captures collected via scripts/branddozer_ui_capture.py for audits and reviews.

wallet_management: Optimizer consolidates fragmented balances, respects fee tiers, withdrawal limits, and dust handling.
Dynamic sizing uses free balance, venue caps, and P&L state; adapts when wallet balances grow.
bus_scheduling_swaps: Batch and sequence swaps across on/off-ramps with modeled transfer/settlement times.
Spread-, liquidity-, and fee-aware pathfinding with fallback rails and hedged interim positions.
Track realized/expected P&L impact of each leg, including gas and bridge fees.
live_transition: Ghost-to-live promotion automated via gates; rollback scripts and drills validated.
Capital ramps use ladders with per-tier ceilings and cooldowns after loss events.

ledgering: Unified ledger for realized/unrealized P&L with attribution by strategy, venue, wallet, and asset.
Fee/slippage decomposition and borrow/gas tracking folded into position P&L.
reporting: PnL curves per tier with hit rate, expectancy, and drawdown; exportable for audit.
Alerts on P&L anomalies versus expected value and slippage budgets.

workstreams.name: Strategy Architecture
deliverables: Tier definitions with deterministic gates and capital ladders.
Signal library with bounded AI usage and CPU-friendly implementations.
Risk model and sizing rules aligned to wallet-aware constraints.

workstreams.name: Simulation and Ghost Trading
deliverables: Backtest/paper/ghost harness with latency, slippage, and fee modeling.
Ghost-to-live gating automation, rollback playbooks, and drills.
Performance dashboards for hit rate, P&L, drawdown, and slippage per tier.

workstreams.name: Execution, Routing, and Wallets
deliverables: Wallet balance optimizer with consolidation and adaptive sizing.
Bus-scheduled swap planner with SLA-, fee-, and spread-aware routing.
Settlement tracking, partial fill handling, and deterministic fallback rails.

workstreams.name: Risk and Controls
deliverables: Hierarchical stops, circuit-breakers, and kill-switch automation.
Config-driven policies, approval flows, and demotion triggers.
Rollback/hedging automation for venue, data, or KPI failures.

workstreams.name: P&L and Oversight
deliverables: Unified P&L ledger with attribution and decomposition.
Structured logging, blotter, decision traces, and screen capture workflow.
Alerts, runbooks, and audits for policy and P&L anomalies.

workstreams.name: Performance and Ops
deliverables: CPU-only performance budgets for routing and inference (i5/32GB).
Profiling and optimization for deterministic paths and bounded AI components.
Deployment profiles for ghost vs live with config drift detection.

milestones.name: M1 Architecture and Controls
exit_criteria: Tier definitions, deterministic gates, and capital ladders approved.
Risk rails, kill-switch, and rollback policies codified.
CPU budget and deterministic-vs-AI boundaries defined.

milestones.name: M2 Ghost Trading Proof
exit_criteria: Backtest/paper/ghost results meet P&L, slippage, and latency targets per tier.
Wallet optimizer and bus scheduler validated in simulation with fee/time modeling.
Observability stack produces logs, blotter, P&L ledger, and screen captures.

milestones.name: M3 Limited Live Ramp
exit_criteria: Minimal capital live trades with enforced caps and successful rollback drills.
Circuit-breakers and auto-flatten proven in production-like drills.
Capital ramp ladder executed only after consecutive green windows per tier.

milestones.name: M4 Productionization
exit_criteria: Full alerting and runbooks in place; on-call trained.
Stable P&L with controlled drawdowns and slippage within budgets.
Audit-ready artifacts with logs, ledger, and screens for sampled trades.

dependencies: Reliable exchange and on/off-ramp APIs with paper modes, fee data, and latency SLAs.
Market data with depth, trades, gas/bridge fees, and funding; integrity checks in place.
CPU-friendly quant libraries and statistical tooling.
Secure key management for wallets and exchange credentials with rotation policies.
Logging/metrics stack with storage for replayable artifacts and captures.
assumptions: Target hardware remains CPU-only (i5, 32GB) without GPU acceleration.
Access to multiple liquid exchanges plus at least one fiat on/off-ramp.
Regulatory constraints permit automated trading on selected venues.
Network connectivity is stable enough for timely market data and routing.

risks.risk: Market gaps or venue downtime during bus-scheduled legs
risks.mitigation: Hedged interim positions, alternate rails, and time/value decay guards

risks.risk: Slippage and fee drag erase edge
risks.impact: Strategy tiers fail to meet P&L targets
risks.mitigation: Spread-aware routing, fee-tier optimization, and dynamic size throttling
Heartbeat monitors, source cross-checks, and fail-safe flatting on gaps

risks.risk: Model overfitting or unbounded AI behavior
risks.impact: Live underperformance versus ghost results or errant trades
risks.mitigation: Deterministic fallbacks, bounded AI scopes, and conservative promotion gates

risks.impact: Inability to size trades or capture spreads
risks.mitigation: Periodic consolidation, dust-handling rules, and fee-aware rebalancing
Performance budgets, profiling, and fallbacks to lighter models

success_metrics: Ghost-to-live performance delta within thresholds for hit rate, P&L, and slippage.
No uncontrolled loss events; max daily drawdown within per-tier budgets.
Slippage plus fees within venue/tier budgets; bus swaps complete within SLA and positive expected value.
Kill-switch and circuit-breaker drills meet MTTR targets; auto-flatten and rollback verified.
CPU/RAM usage within i5/32GB budget under peak routing and inference.
100 percent of evaluated trades produce logs/blotter entries, ledger updates, and required screen captures.

quant_research: Signal research, factor validation, and tier promotion rules
